functions.name: isHistoryEnabled
functions.description: Returns the value of the 'places.history.enabled' preference

functions.name: isUploadDisabled
functions.description: Returns the value of the 'extensions.screenshots.upload-disabled' preference

functions.name: setLifecycleListener
functions.description: registers one callback that is called when the 'extensions.screenshots.upload-disabled' pref is changed. If called twice, overwrites.

functions.name: removeLifecycleListener
functions.description: possibly unnecessary TODO function that removes the pref-listener callback

functions.name: isEnabled
functions.description: Returns the inverse of the value of the 'extensions.screenshots.disabled' preference

functions.name: initLibraryButton
functions.description: Initializes the Photon-based Library menu item for Screenshots

functions.name: uninitLibraryButton
functions.description: Removes the Photon-based Library menu item for Screenshots
